 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָסַס‎</span>] **verb** ==press, crush==, by treading, ==tread down== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲסִיסִיה‎</span> ***crushed*** wheat; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***go the rounds, [tramp], prowl***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***explore***, see [[BDB#Brock|Brock]]); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine plural figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָֽרְשָׁעִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַסּוֺתֶם‎</span> [[Mal.3.21|Mal 3:21]] (consecutive).
